title: His trysting place
creator_credit: Charles Chaplin, Mack Sennett and Keystone Film Company
brief_description: Charles Chaplin and Mack Swain are belaboured by their respective spouses because of a mistakenly placed assignation note. Cast also includes Cast also includes Mabel Normand and Phyllis Allen.
